Animals¶

The animal module¶

class biosim.animals.Animal[source]¶

A class with the common traits of Herbivores and Carnivores

eat(amount)[source]¶

Updates the weight of the animal

Parameters

amount (int) – The amount of food being eaten

losing_weight()[source]¶

A function that updates the weight of an animal.

migrate()[source]¶

A function that tells if an animal is going to migrate any given years

Returns

bool

Return type

True or False

update_age()[source]¶

A function that updates the age of an animal.

update_fitness()[source]¶

A function that updates the fitness of an animal. It is called before it is used in calculations

\[q^±(x, x{\frac{1}{2}}, \phi) = \frac {1} {1 + e^{±\phi \times (x - x{\frac{1}{2}})}}\]

\(\phi = 0\) if \(w \leq 0\)

\(\phi = q^+ *q^-\) otherwise

formula above

class biosim.animals.Carnivore(weight, age)[source]¶

A class for the Carnivore-species. They will act as the hunter on the island, and will act according to their parameters and specifications. It will only eat Herbivores

Parameters

  • weight (int) – weight of the animal

  • age (int) – age of the animal (0 at birth)

carn_birth(num_carn)[source]¶

A function for the Carnivore giving birth.

Parameters

num_carn – The number of varnivores in a cell/tile

Returns

Carnivore or None

classmethod count_animals()[source]¶

A class method that updates the number of instances of a species (Herbivore or Carnivore). The instance_count is used to track the number of animals currently in “existence”. It is called at “birth” or at the creation of an animal.

death()[source]¶

A function that calculates whether a Carnivore dies or not.

Returns

self.dead

Return type

True or False

classmethod disp_carns()[source]¶

A function for printing the number of carnivores on the island.

herb_killed(herb_fitness)[source]¶

A funtction that calculates whether or not a Carnivore will kill (and later eat) a Herbivore.

Parameters

herb_fitness – the fitness of the Herbivore in question

Returns

bool

Return type

True or False

classmethod remove_animals()[source]¶

A class method that updates the number of instances of a species (Herbivore or Carnivore). The instance_count is used to track the number of animals currently in “existence”. It is called at the “death” of an animal.

classmethod set_params(new_params)[source]¶

A class method that updates the number of instances of the Carnivore species. The instance_count is used to track the number of animals currently on the island. It is called at “birth” or at the creation of an animal.

class biosim.animals.Herbivore(weight, age)[source]¶

A class for the Herbivore-species. They will act as the food-source for the Carnivores, and will act according to their parameters and specifications.

Parameters

  • weight (int) – weight of the animal

  • age (int) – age of the animal (0 at birth)

classmethod count_animals()[source]¶

A class method that updates the number of instances of the Herbivore species. The instance_count is used to track the number of animals currently on the island. It is called at “birth” or at the creation of an animal.

death()[source]¶

A function for calculating if a herbivore dies

Return self.dead

Return type

True or False

classmethod disp_herbs()[source]¶

A classmethod that prints the current number of Herbivores on the island

herb_birth(num_herb)[source]¶

A function for herbivores giving birth :param num_herb: number of herbivores in a tile/cell

Returns

Herbivore or None

classmethod remove_animals()[source]¶

A class method that updates the number of instances of Herbivore. The instance_count is used to track the number of animals currently on the Island. It is called at the death of an animal.

classmethod set_params(new_params)[source]¶
Parameters

new_params – dict of new parameters e.g {param:value}

Raises

KeyError –

Biosim
